name: 盧大平
objective: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題，其內容包括國內外全球運籌之發展、全球運籌之相關功能、全球運籌之經營與運作模式、績效衡量及其他與全球運籌相關議題，如供應鏈管理及物流等。此外，本課程亦將提供案例研討，以本課程理論與實務並重。
schedule:
Supply Chain Management Overview
Role of Logistic Management
Global Dimensions of Supply Chain
Supply Chain Performance Measurements
Supply Chain Technology – Managing information Flows
Transportation Management and Facility Location
scorePolicy:
Final Project 40%
Homework and Casework 30%
Class Participation – (Think and Discuss) 30%
materials: Managing Supply Chains – A Logistic Approach, Langley/Coyle, Eighth Edition
